main event: A UFO sighting was reported on November 9, 1956, involving one long red object that appeared to hover before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for three to four minutes., The object was described as being the size of a dime at arm's length., The object hovered in one spot before disappearing., A meteor was sighted in the area at the same time., The data in the report was deemed insufficient for further evaluation.
